This blog post just contains the links I mention in my video that you can watch [here](https://youtu.be/Z5xNALiILzg).

I mention the following books, packages, and people in my video:

- [echarts4r](https://echarts4r.john-coene.com/index.html)
- [targets](https://wlandau.github.io/targets/)
- [easystats](https://github.com/easystats)
- [Applied Economics with R](https://hhsievertsen.github.io/applied_econ_with_r/#Welcome)
- [coolbutuseless](https://github.com/coolbutuseless?tab=repositories)
- [Data Science ZJ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKxHtRdtFEPihEjTtjG8Y8w/featured) and [disk.frame](https://diskframe.com/)
- [Statistical Rethinking](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4WVelCswXo4&list=PLDcUM9US4XdNM4Edgs7weiyIguLSToZRI) 
- [Golem](https://thinkr-open.github.io/golem/) and [Engineering production-grade shiny apps](https://engineering-shiny.org/)
- [ModernDive](https://moderndive.com/)

Many others created and shared amazing content during the year, so sorry I could not mention
everyone!

Happy new year to all and thank you for the ongoing support!

Hope you enjoyed! If you found this blog post useful, you might want to follow 
me on [twitter](https://www.twitter.com/brodriguesco) for blog post updates and

You can also watch my videos on [youtube](https://www.youtube.com/c/BrunoRodrigues1988/).
